snippet: Two tests were carried out with ad blockers: one to measure how much loading times were improved and the second to study battery life.
abstract: Tech Fix column; variety of ad blockers for mobile devices are tested and assessed; key criterion is to what degree blockers reduce web page data sizes and improve loading times.
lead_paragraph: Two tests were carried out with ad blockers: one to measure how much loading times were improved and the second to study battery life.

headline.main: Putting Mobile Ad Blockers to the Test
